name: Doom Towers
description:
In A World Of Zombies, The Zomb Slayer Starts His Own Base Of Towers To Destroy The Spawner. But He Failed Doing So And Now It's Up To YOU To Destroy The Spawner?  Find Out In This Fast-Paced Action Title DOOM TOWERS.

Your Goal

Destroy All 6 Spawners Across The Map

Highlights

1. MAX OF 2000 RANDOMLY SPAWNED TOWER 

2. Powerups To Defeat Spawners

3. Shotgun

TUTORIAl:

MOVE with WASD, shoot with mouse 1. To activate a tower, u need to connect it to the main joint. To Connect a tower: press E near the power joint, and then walk to the tower u want to connect, press E again, if you want to drop the wire press E. But beware - you cannot shoot while carrying the wire. Somewhere across the map, the enemy spawners are hidden, your goal is to destroy them. Follow the enemy steps to fin the spawner. But beware, some enemies will atack your power joint, and it will only take 20 hits before breaking, so protect it wisely. Good luck, and don't die.

The upgrade tower gives u a random powerup, you also do't know what it is, it can be temporary invincibility/ increased fire rate / increased spead.
